trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegate, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> enumeration and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler>委派，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>列舉型別和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form.
trans-unit.target: 要執行此範例，將下列程式碼貼在表單中。

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`InitializeStatusBarPanels`表單的建構函式中的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理方法。
